titles.title: A bill to eliminate cost-of-living increases for Federal programs in fiscal year 1988.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 11/10/1987--Introduced. Prohibits any cost-of-living increase for FY 1988 for Federal payments or benefits. Declares that such increase that would have resulted for FY 1988 cannot be taken into account to determine such increase for any other fiscal year.
